title: Trio indicted in 5-year-old Ana Garza's murder
content:
Three suspects have been formally indicted by a Grand Jury in the murder of a 5-year-old girl who was shot dead while sleeping inside of her east-side home.
Abdi Abdi, age 18, Murjan Abdi, age 19, and Christian Lopez, age 19, have all been indicted for Capital Murder in Garza's death.
The indictment alleges the men, along with a fourth unidentified suspect, were attempting to burglarize the home in the 800 block of Pecan Valley on June 1, 2016, the night of the shooting.
The suspects severely injured Garza's stepfather before shooting into the home where she was sleeping.
One of the bullets struck Garza in the head. She died a week later from her injuries.
The suspects fled the scene in a car they reportedly stole at gunpoint two days before the shooting.
